name: 弗兰克卡瓦

last_movies.title: 福斯特医生 第二季

introduction: Frank was discovered by casting agents for Horrid Henry the Movie when he was 10 yrs old. He has since enjoyed acting on TV, commercials and theatre. Frank keeps a level head and is not afraid of hard work. He is sporty and intelligent with a good sense of humour. Frank is currently a member of the National Youth Theatre and will take part in his first theatre production at the Edinburgh Fringe this year.SkillsAccents Chinese, Spanish, AmericanLanguages Mandarin, SpanishMusic:Piano (grade 2)Sport:Karate blue belt, Football, Slalom Ski Racing, Diving, Wing Chun Martial ArtsDance Street
